verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No more veil! God bids me enter By the new and living way -- Not in trembling hope I venture, Boldly I His call obey: There, with Him, my God I meet, God upon the mercy seat!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the robes of spotless whiteness, With the blood of priceless worth, He has gone into that brightness, Christ rejected from the earth -- Christ accepted there on high, And in Him do I draw nigh.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, the welcome I have found there, God in all His love made known! Oh, the glories that surround there, Those accepted in His Son! Who can tell the depth of bliss Spoken by the Father's kiss?{/lang-eng}
